Package model

Interface IModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockModel, ModelImpl
    public interface IModel
    This interface for the operations that can be performed.

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        void populate​(java.lang.Readable readable,
              java.lang.String ticker)
        Populates the model with stock data extracted from a readable source.
        Parameters:
        readable - stock information
        ticker - ticker symbol for the stock

      • crossover

        java.util.ArrayList<java.time.LocalDate> crossover​(int avg,
                                                   java.time.LocalDate date1,
                                                   java.time.LocalDate date2,
                                                   java.lang.String ticker)
        Finds the crossover points between the moving average and the actual stock prices.
        Parameters:
        avg - the window size of the moving average
        date1 - the start date of the analysis period
        date2 - the end date of the analysis period
        ticker - ticker symbol for the stock
        Returns:
        a list of dates when crossovers occur between the moving average and the stock prices

      • gainOrLoss

        double gainOrLoss​(java.time.LocalDate start,
                  java.time.LocalDate close,
                  java.lang.String ticker)
        Calculates the gain or loss of a stock between two dates.
        Parameters:
        start - the start date
        close - the end date
        ticker - ticker symbol for the stock
        Returns:
        the percentage gain or loss during the period

      • movingAverage

        double movingAverage​(int movingWindow,
                     java.time.LocalDate date,
                     java.lang.String ticker)
        Find a stock's moving average over a window of time.
        Parameters:
        movingWindow - the number of days in the moving average window
        date - the date for which to calculate the moving average
        ticker - ticker symbol for the stock
        Returns:
        the moving average price of the stock

      • createPortfolio

        IPortfolio createPortfolio​(java.lang.String ticker,
                           int share,
                           java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new stock portfolio with an initial stock.
        Parameters:
        ticker - ticker symbol for the stock
        share - the number of shares of the ticker to include
        name - the name of the new portfolio
        Returns:
        the newly created portfolio

        s - the name of the portfolio
        cal - date to evaluate the portfolio at
